info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL RUTHERFORD AND CENTRAL POLK COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Rutherfordton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forest City, Rutherfordton, Spindale, Lake Lure, Bostic, Chimney Rock State Park, Green Hill, Mill Spring, Harris, and Lake Adger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
